Text:
Stablecoins are the heroes of this space

- Stores and secures value
- Can be done in a permissionless way like $DAI
- If done trustlessly, gives users the benefits of stable money with the benefits of censorship resistance

Just need to move the peg away from fiat for max effect

Liquid will support the migration to Multi-Collateral $DAI and will begin the network update on 30th November at 5pm JST.

We advise our users to be cautious when sending or receiving DAI during this transition.

Learn more: http://help.liquid.com/en/articles/3523949-multi-collateral-dai-upgrade-announcement…

Text: A 2% DSR won't do much for demand when most holders could get higher interest rates elsewhere. DSR needs to get to at least 4% to start becoming appealing to big money outside the #cryptocurrency ecosystem. $MKR $DAI
Embedded_text:

@delitzer

But don’t worry, even if every last DAI ended up in the CHAI contract, the DSR would still be just as effective as a demand-side lever.

DSR
->demand
DSR
->demand
The supply-side lever is all about the stability fee.

Stability Fee
->supply

->supply
